sub_title: Senior Executive | Proven track record in Business Growth and Supply Chain | Passionate about International Leadership and Global Strategy | Executive MBA
summary:
Senior Executive with a proven track record in business growth (turnaround strategic planning) and supply chain. Passionate about leadership and international business. 

I am from the Netherlands and have been working in logistics & supply chain for a Belgian company since 2011. I have worked in different commercial- and management roles, which gave me a deep and solid understanding of how cultural differences influence international business, leadership and just getting everyone to support the strategy. After my Masters in Russian Literature, I wanted to make my career in international business and moved with my future life partner to Saint-Petersburg and found a sales position with Ahlers in Russia. 

In my career with Ahlers I have >8 years of top executive management experience. I bring substantial international business accumen and commercial-, supply chain- and export experience to the table. I also have a deep understanding of managing team across geographies and cultures in a multi-stakeholder environment. 

I thrive as a first mover and in my current role I work with teams from Western-Europe, Russia, Baltics and China to deliver tailor made supply chain solutions, sometimes going beyond logistics, strategically facilitating the business of our clients. 

In 2021 I started an Executive MBA at Stockholm School of Economics in Sweden, studying alongside full time work. I chose to study in Sweden, a global leader in inclusiveness, equality and sustainability, to get a better understanding of best practices and how to implement them.

- Drive marketing strategy and execution 
- Since 2019 member of the Executive Management Committee and report to the CEO
- Industry: FMCG, Chemicals, Machinery, Spare Parts, apparel, electronics (service logistics) 
- Managing warehousing, International Forwarding, Trading activities, distribution & last mile delivery set-up, E-commerce development

Main achievement: re-designed commercial strategy, meaning a change in sales approach from transactional- to consultative selling.", 'title': 'Business Unit Manager Trade Facilitation & After Sales Service ', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}, {'location': 'Saint Petersburg, Russian Federation', 'date': {'start': {'month': 7, 'day': None, 'year': 2014}, 'end': {'month': 2, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}}, 'company': 'Ahlers', 'description': '- Responsible to commercialize and develop the branch further

Main achievement: put operational and commercial processes in place that allowed to scale and further developed existing customers and add new customers.', 'title': 'Branch Manager Ahlers RusImport', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}, {'location': 'Saint Petersburg, Russian Federation', 'date': {'start': {'month': 6, 'day': None, 'year': 2011}, 'end': {'month': 6, 'day': None, 'year': 2014}}, 'company': 'Ahlers', 'description': "I started my professional career mid 2011 when I graduated from university in the Netherlands and decided I wanted to go into international business. I went to St. Petersburg, Russia (where I studied previously), started networking and found a job with Ahlers in sales. 

The first years I worked as sales and was responsible for hunting and new business development. By continuously going to trade shows and making cold calls I learnt basic commercial skills as persuading, influencing, presenting, networking and creating value. During my first 1,5 year in sales I managed to attract several new customers, exceeding targets. What I learnt was to say 'no' to customers when our services did not meet their requirements. I managed to attract customers from Western-Europe, USA and Russia. 

After a few years I was promoted to senior sales where I further refined my commercial skills and one of the customer I acquired later became the biggest customer of Ahlers in terms of turnover and profitability.", 'title': 'Sr. Sales Manager Supply Chain Solutions', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}]}, {'company': {'id': 1808504, 'name': 'Netherlands-Russia Centre', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4E0BAQHKCN-XZtlaSw/company-logo_400_400/0/1554111785409?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=PgmdC_DPB60_UwMSQYkk_zUbYFVGzZ7qhs3gXu3nkX4', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/nrce/', 'employees': {'start': 2, 'end': 10}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2012}, 'end': {'month': 6, 'day': None, 'year': 2022}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Saint Petersburg, Russian Federation', 'date': {'start': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2012}, 'end': {'month': 6, 'day': None, 'year': 2022}}, 'company': 'The Netherlands Russia Centre (NRCE)', 'description': "While having full time responsibilities at Ahlers I was responsible for general management of the activities of the Netherlands - Russia centre in Russia. This means team management (3 FTE's), creating brand awareness as well as business development.  

During 10 years I developed the Netherlands - Russia Centre and transformed the organization from having ad-hoc orders to having ~15 recurring customers. We did this by transforming the business model and rolling out the new strategy. 

I also was a frequent speaker on seminars and webinars in the Netherlands, such as KvK (Dutch Chamber of Commerce), WTC Leeuwarden Business Academy and RVO.", 'title': 'Director Russia', 'employment_type': 'Part-time'}]}]
